DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Effects Health Care Utilization
DOC.detailed_description: BACKGROUND : In recent year , benefit physically active lifestyle well establish respect chronic health problem coronary heart disease , hypertension , obesity osteoporosis . However , extent physical activity influence health care utilization less clear . If physical activity level inversely associate utilization pattern , policy encourage exercise may produce short-term reduction health care cost . DESIGN NARRATIVE : A multivariate regression analysis conduct representative sample 600 adult participate longitudinal field trial health risk appraisal instrument . Using Harvard Alumni Activity Survey physical activity measure , analysis control variety predisposing , enable , need characteristic also influence utilization behavior . The study completion date list record obtain `` End Date '' enter Protocol Registration Results System ( PRS ) record .
